summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 38786, creating Local Improvement District No. 3170, entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Juneau Street, from Park Boulevard to Seward Park Avenue; Seward Park Avenue, from Juneau Street, to Fifty-seventh Avenue South (formerly Meadow Avenue); Fifty-seventh Avenue South, from Seward Park Avenue to Holly Street; holly Street, from Fifty-seventh Avenue South to the west line of lot three (3), block thirteen (13), Plat of Brighton Beach; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with File No. 68875, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds," approved the 2nd day of October, 1918.
